abstract: United Nations human rights investigator Marzuki Darusman raises grave concerns about North Korean practice of deploying thousands of workers overseas, saying it amounts to forced labor.
lead_paragraph: A special United Nations investigator said that much of the earnings of more than 50,000 North Korean workers were taken by their government.

headline.main: North Korea Is Accused of Abusing Workers
headline.print_headline: North Korea Is Accused of Abusing Workers

snippet: A special United Nations investigator said that much of the earnings of more than 50,000 North Korean workers were taken by their government.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
